com.google.crypto.tink.signature.internal

Class SigUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.crypto.tink.signature.internal.SigUtil

  • public final class SigUtil
extends Object
    Utility functions to convert to and from signature-related proto.

    • Method Detail

      • validateEcdsaParams

        public static void validateEcdsaParams(com.google.crypto.tink.proto.EcdsaParams params)
                                throws GeneralSecurityException
        Validates Ecdsa's parameters. The hash's strength must not be weaker than the curve's strength.
        Parameters:
        params - the Ecdsa's parameters protocol buffer.
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - iff it's invalid.

      • validateRsaSsaPkcs1Params

        public static void validateRsaSsaPkcs1Params(com.google.crypto.tink.proto.RsaSsaPkcs1Params params)
                                      throws GeneralSecurityException
        Validates RsaSsaPkcs1's parameters. As SHA1 is unsafe, we will only support SHA256 and SHA512 for digital signature.
        Parameters:
        params - the RsaSsaPkcs1Params protocol buffer.
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - iff it's invalid.

      • validateRsaSsaPssParams

        public static void validateRsaSsaPssParams(com.google.crypto.tink.proto.RsaSsaPssParams params)
                                    throws GeneralSecurityException
        Validates RsaSsaPss's parameters.
        • The MGF1 hash function must be the same as the signature hash function.
        • The hash function used must be either SHA256, SHA384, or SHA512.
        • The salt length must be non-zero.
          Parameters:
          params - the RsaSsaPssParams protocol buffer.
          Throws:
          GeneralSecurityException - iff it's invalid.

        • toHashType

          public static Enums.HashType toHashType(com.google.crypto.tink.proto.HashType hash)
                                 throws GeneralSecurityException
          Converts protobuf enum HashType to raw Java enum Enums.HashType.
          Throws:
          GeneralSecurityException - if the HashType is not SHA256, SHA384, or SHA512.

        • toCurveType

          public static EllipticCurves.CurveType toCurveType(com.google.crypto.tink.proto.EllipticCurveType type)
                                            throws GeneralSecurityException
          Converts protobuf enum EllipticCurveType to raw Java enum {code CurveType}.
          Throws:
          GeneralSecurityException

          Throws:
          GeneralSecurityException

        • toUnsignedIntByteString

          public static com.google.protobuf.ByteString toUnsignedIntByteString(BigInteger i)
          Returns the unsigned byte representation of the input BigInteger. BigInteger's toByteArray returns a two's complement representation of non-negative integers, which might include an extra zero byte at position 0 (in big endian).
